casos = int(input())
cont = 0
lista = []
while cont < casos:
    respuesta = []
    S = input()
    T = input()
    for i in range(len(S)):
        if S[i] == T[i]:
            respuesta.append('G')
        else:
            respuesta.append('B')
    wordle = ''.join(respuesta)
    lista.append(wordle)
    cont += 1
for i in range(len(lista)):
    print(lista[i])

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    s = input()
    s1 = list(s)
    m = input()
    m1 = list(m)
    for i in range(len(m1)):
        if m1[i] in s1[i]:
            m1.pop(i)
            m1.insert(i, 'G')
        else:
            m1.pop(i)
            m1.insert(i, 'B')
    s3 = ''
    for i in m1:
        s3 = s3 + i
    print(s3)
